column2: China Xiangtai Food Co., Ltd. engages in pork processing business. The company is headquartered in Chongqing, Chongqing and currently employs 178 full-time employees. The firm is mainly engaged in slaughtering, processing, packing, and selling various processed meat products. The firm's main products include fresh products and processing products. Fresh series products mainly include fresh pork and byproducts, beef, lamb, chicken, duck and rabbit meat. Processing products mainly include shredded meat, sliced meat, meat stuffing, pickled meat, lamb and offal, sausage, bacon, steamed meat, breaded chicken and spicy meat. he Company distributes its products to supermarkets and farmers.
Xiangtai Plaza, Building B, Suite 21-1, Chongqing
